name: resolveStatus(for:with:)
desc: Resolves the bill status to use during your search.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.
declaration:

                       with completion: @escaping (INPaymentStatusResolutionResult) -> Void)
